title: New Guinea coffee and cocoa
creator_credit: Peter Whitchurch and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Shows the thriving coffee and cocoa industries of Papua New Guinea. Discusses the use of modern machinery, research stations, and the wide export markets.
